storageModal.title: Storage Rental
storageModal.projectDescription: In this projekt my goal was to brush up on my React and Redux skills and also automatize email corresponding with potentional costumer.

landloardModal.title: The Landloard
landloardModal.projectDescription: In this projekt my goal was to brush up on my HTML and CSS skills and also play around with the CSS. Far from done!

webshopModal.title: Node Teamwork
webshopModal.projectDescription: Me and another student got a finished FrontEnd (Vue) and worked with Node JS, Mongoose and MongoDB for the school exam. Very fun project and awesome collaboration!

bookLibraryModal.title: The Bookstore
bookLibraryModal.projectDescription: This project did me and 4 other students during our Agile course. It was very fun to work in the Agile way, I got the chance to take on the role as scrum master which I thought was fun and a role that both me and my peers thought suited me. Extra fun that we delivered a result that we were proud of.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.textPart1: Hello, I´m Mandus Lindström born year 1985 in Sweden.
aboutPage.textPart2: I am a FrontEnd student and i am looking for work opportunities.
aboutPage.textPart3: I have a big passion for coding and especially to get the coding result in a fast and understandable way, both for my peers and future Mandus Lindström. The most difficult coding problems i think is the most fun.
aboutPage.textPart4: One day I will be happy to call myself a fullstack developer. Right now I am enjoying coding with JS and React very much, my BackEnd skills need improvments... With that said i do not have anything against learning new skills, but for now i am focused on deepening my skillset.
